ValidationRule.description: Prohibits editing of Adjustment/Refund Additional Charges after approval for Finance users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Active'),OR( ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Refund'),ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Adjustment')), $Permission.FP_Finance_Permissions)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't edit Additional Charges record of "Refund or 'Adjustment' type after approval.
